CustomField.formula: "At this time it does not appear that our companies business models are aligned. Therefore, pursuant to the above-referenced Agreement, NVIDIA is hereby providing Partner with written notice of termination of the Agreement. Under the terms of the Agreement, this termination will become effective on " &Case(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+ 30), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", 12, "December", "None") &" " & TEXT(DAY (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)+ 30)) &", "&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + 30)) & "(“Termination Date”)."
CustomField.label: TerminationLetterfirstParagraph
